channel.title: Adding Owner Crown/Chat colours
channel.description: Hello, I am using a 317 Delta Source (flame all you want.) For all these tuts, you are changing the admin crown so it looks same on owner and admin. I was wondering if you guys could tell me how to add a crown in the chat log for OWNERS ONLY (playerRights = 3) Thanks, and one more thing I know my source has colors (ex: @blu@) because they are coded in some names on the rules and shops, But they wont work in yell/ingame chat. I was wondering if you could tell me how to fix that as well, and maybe add to yell so instead of say: [Owner] (username): (blah blah blah) It says: [Owner] (username): (blah blah blah)

item.title: Adding Owner Crown/Chat colours
item.dc:creator: @xDizzay xDizzay
item.description:
@xDizzay wrote:

[quote=“moparRuler, post:2, topic:393503”]in your yell command simple add a code like this.

This makes it blue with owner next to name + the gold crown in yell.

You might need rewrite it a bit for delta, unsure not a delta user myself.[/quote]

I’m looking for the color for ::yell only, and a custom crown for playerRights 3.
For rights 2 and 3 they are the same crown, i wanna change for player rights 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Owner Crown/Chat colours
item.dc:creator: @moparRuler moparRuler

@moparRuler wrote:

in your yell command simple add a code like this.

This makes it blue with owner next to name + the gold crown in yell.

You might need rewrite it a bit for delta, unsure not a delta user myself.

item.title: Adding Owner Crown/Chat colours
item.dc:creator: @xDizzay xDizzay
item.description:
@xDizzay wrote:

Hello, I am using a 317 Delta Source (flame all you want.)
For all these tuts, you are changing the admin crown so it looks same on owner and admin.
I was wondering if you guys could tell me how to add a crown in the chat log for OWNERS ONLY (playerRights = 3)
Thanks, and one more thing
I know my source has colors (ex: @blu@) because they are coded in some names on the rules and shops,
But they wont work in yell/ingame chat.
I was wondering if you could tell me how to fix that as well, and maybe add to yell so instead of say:
[Owner] (username): (blah blah blah)
It says:
[Owner] (username): (blah blah blah)

Read full topic
